00104 template <class T>
00105 class EGS_PRISM_EXPORT EGS_PrismT : public EGS_BaseGeometry {
00106 
00107 protected:
00108 
00109     T      *p;             
00110     EGS_Vector a;          
00111     EGS_Float
00112     d1, 
00113     d2; 
00114 
00115     bool   open; 
00116 
00117 public:
00118 
00124     EGS_PrismT(T *P, const string &Name="") :
00125         EGS_BaseGeometry(Name), p(P), a(p->getNormal()), open(true) {
00126         is_convex = p->isConvex();
00127     };
00128 
00135     EGS_PrismT(T *P, EGS_Float D1, EGS_Float D2, const string &Name="") :
00136         EGS_BaseGeometry(Name), p(P), a(p->getNormal()),
00137         d1(D1), d2(D2), open(false) {
00138         if (d1 > d2) {
00139             d1 = D2;
00140             d2 = D1;
00141         }
00142         is_convex = p->isConvex();
00143     };
00144 
00146     ~EGS_PrismT() {
00147         delete p;
00148     };
00149 
00150     bool isInside(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00151         if (!open) {
00152             EGS_Float d = p->distance(x);
00153             if (d < d1 || d > d2) {
00154                 return false;
00155             }
00156         }
00157         return p->isInside2D(x);
00158     };
00159 
00160     int isWhere(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00161         if (isInside(x)) {
00162             return 0;
00163         }
00164         else {
00165             return -1;
00166         }
00167     };
00168     int inside(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00169         return isWhere(x);
00170     };
00171 
00172     int howfar(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00173                EGS_Float &t, int *newmed = 0, EGS_Vector *normal = 0) {
00174         EGS_2DVector v;
00175         EGS_2DVector *pv = normal ? &v : 0;
00176         if (open) {
00177             bool hit = p->howfar2D(ireg == 0 ? true : false,x,u,t,pv);
00178             if (!hit) {
00179                 return ireg;
00180             }
00181             if (newmed) {
00182                 *newmed = !ireg ? -1 : med;
00183             }
00184             if (normal) {
00185                 *normal = p->getNormal(v);
00186             }
00187             return !ireg ? -1 : 0;
00188         }
00189         EGS_Float up = a*u, d = p->distance(x);
00190         if (!ireg) {  // inside
00191             EGS_Float tt = 1e30;
00192             int inew = ireg;
00193             if (up > 0) {
00194                 tt = (d2 - d)/up;
00195             }
00196             else {
00197                 tt = (d1 - d)/up;
00198             }
00199             if (tt <= t) {
00200                 t = tt;
00201                 inew = -1;
00202                 if (normal) {
00203                     *normal = up>0 ? a*(-1) : a;
00204                 }
00205                 if (newmed) {
00206                     *newmed = -1;
00207                 }
00208             }
00209             bool hit = p->howfar2D(true,x,u,t,pv);
00210             if (!hit) {
00211                 return inew;
00212             }
00213             if (newmed) {
00214                 *newmed = -1;
00215             }
00216             if (normal) {
00217                 *normal = p->getNormal(v);
00218             }
00219             return -1;
00220         }
00221         if (d < d1 || d > d2) {
00222             EGS_Float tt = 1e30;
00223             if (d < d1 && up > 0) {
00224                 tt = (d1 - d)/up;
00225             }
00226             else if (d > d2 && up < 0) {
00227                 tt = (d2 - d)/up;
00228             }
00229             if (tt < t) {
00230                 EGS_Vector xp(x + u*tt);
00231                 if (p->isInside2D(xp)) {
00232                     t = tt;
00233                     if (newmed) {
00234                         *newmed = med;
00235                     }
00236                     if (normal) {
00237                         *normal = up>0 ? a*(-1) : a;
00238                     }
00239                     return 0;
00240                 }
00241             }
00242         }
00243         EGS_Float tt = t;
00244         bool hit = p->howfar2D(false,x,u,tt,pv);
00245         if (!hit) {
00246             return ireg;
00247         }
00248         d = p->distance(x+u*tt);
00249         if (d >= d1 && d <= d2) {
00250             t = tt;
00251             if (newmed) {
00252                 *newmed = med;
00253             }
00254             if (normal) {
00255                 *normal = p->getNormal(v);
00256             }
00257             return 0;
00258         }
00259         return ireg;
00260     };
00261 
00262     EGS_Float hownear(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x) {
00263         EGS_Float tperp = p->hownear2D(ireg == 0 ? true : false,x);
00264         if (open) {
00265             return tperp;
00266         }
00267         EGS_Float d = p->distance(x);
00268         if (!ireg) {  // inside
00269             EGS_Float t = d2 - d;
00270             if (t < tperp) {
00271                 tperp = t;
00272             }
00273             t = d - d1;
00274             if (t < tperp) {
00275                 tperp = t;
00276             }
00277         }
00278         else {
00279             EGS_Float t;
00280             if (d < d1) {
00281                 t = d1 - d;
00282             }
00283             else if (d > d2) {
00284                 t = d - d2;
00285             }
00286             else {
00287                 return tperp;
00288             }
00289             if (p->isInside2D(x)) {
00290                 tperp = t;
00291             }
00292             else {
00293                 tperp = sqrt(tperp*tperp + t*t);
00294             }
00295         }
00296         return tperp;
00297     };
00298 
00299     //const string &getType() const { return type; };
00300     const string &getType() const {
00301         return p->getType();
00302     };
00303 
00304     void printInfo() const {
00305         EGS_BaseGeometry::printInfo();
00306         if (open) {
00307             egsInformation("  open\n");
00308         }
00309         else {
00310             egsInformation("  closed with planes at %g and %g\n",d1,d2);
00311         }
00312         egsInformation("===================================================\n");
00313     };
00314 
00315 };
00316 
00318 typedef EGS_PrismT<EGS_PolygonYZ> EGS_PrismX;
00320 typedef EGS_PrismT<EGS_PolygonXZ> EGS_PrismY;
00322 typedef EGS_PrismT<EGS_PolygonXY> EGS_PrismZ;
00324 typedef EGS_PrismT<EGS_Polygon> EGS_Prism;
